transArray.content: This hotel is the best one I have stayed in in so many Hanting hotels. The service attitude of the beautiful lady at the front desk is very good. The breakfast is also very rich and has many kinds. The room is very clean and quiet. The most important thing is that it is very close to the Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station. It's within walking distance, so convenient.

Your satisfaction is the biggest motivation for our work. Hanting Chaoyang Railway Station has always provided the most sincere and enthusiastic service to bring every guest a home away from home experience. Your smile is our best reward. Thank you for your choice and look forward to it. See you again and wish you a happy life!
